title: Clubs still don't work
body:
So after riot re enabled clubs i was kicked from the club that i own, except my mates have shown me that my account is still in and the owner of the club.

this has happened to other people and from what I've seen it only happened to other club owners. does anyone know how to fix this or does riot need to intervene

replies.body:
same. i sent a ticket in. and they asked for the following.

> Name of the Club:
Club Tag:
Summoner Names of other members of this Club or if the Club has an officer, the Summoner name of the Officer:
Can the other members of the Club see you as the Club owner?

They will temporarily remove and re add you. Your Officer becomes the owner and you have to ask them to transfer ownership back. If you have no officer, nominate a person to become the interim owner.

That's exactly what has to be done, cheers for the assist!

Edit: But after we remove you from the club, the new owner is the one that will have to re-invite and add you.

Am i correct in assuming then, that the owner of every club in the world, needs to submit a ticket, transfer ownership to someone else (who they may not even know very well), just so they can be removed, and hopefully be invited back into their own club?

That doesn't sound like much of a 'fix' to me.

As far as I'm aware, it does not affect every club owner. Of course, the team working on the club fix has been informed of this problem. Hopefully we'll have a better fix done rather than having everyone go through this process :S but I can't guarantee it.

I've reported these like more than 5 times now to Riot support, except for the weird pings one. I might have reported that once. I really think there are troll teams now -.- Some of these problems are old ones but on steroids.
Ah ok i see, thats okay, thanks for clarifying that! :)
thanks i'll give it a go
